Uses of Class
hesml.measures.impl.SimilaritySemanticMeasure

  • Packages that use SimilaritySemanticMeasure 
    Package Description
    hesml.measures.impl  

    • Uses of SimilaritySemanticMeasure in hesml.measures.impl

      Subclasses of SimilaritySemanticMeasure in hesml.measures.impl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  BaseJiangConrathMeasure
      This class implements some common functions used by all the measures derived from the Jiang-Conrath distance.
      (package private) class  MeasureAlMubaidNguyen2009
      This class implements the semantic distance introduced by Al-Mubaid+ and Nguyen in the paper below: Al-Mubaid, H., and Nguyen, H.
      (package private) class  MeasureCosineLin
      This class implements an unpublished similarity measure prototyped by Lastra-Díaz and García-Serrano which is a cosine-normalized version of the classic Lin (1997) similarity measure.
      (package private) class  MeasureCosineNormJiangConrath
      This class implements the cosine-normalized Jiang-Conrath similarity which is introduced in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureCosineNormWeightedJiangConrath
      This class implements the cosine-normalized weighted Jiang-Conrath similarity measure that is introduced in the following paper.
      (package private) class  MeasureExpNormJiangConrath
      This class implements an unpublished similarity measure defined by Lastra-Díaz and García-Serrano that is a exponential-like version of our cosine-normalized Jiang-Conrath similarity measure introduced in the next paper.
      (package private) class  MeasureFaith
      This class implements the semantic similarity measure called FaiTH, which is introduced in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureGao2015Method3
      This class implements the similarity measure called method 3 that is introduced in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureGarla
      This class implements a similarity measure defined by the reciprocal of the Jiang-Conrath distance which is introduced by Garla and Brandt in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureHao
      This class implements the similarity measures defined in equation (4) of the paper introduced by Hao et al.
      (package private) class  MeasureJiangConrath
      This class implements the semantic distance introduced by Jiang and Conrath in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureLeacockChodorow
      This class implements the measure introduced by Leacock and Chodorow in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureLi2003Strategy3
      This class implements the similarity measure called strategy 3 introduced in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureLi2003Strategy4
      This class implements the similarity measure called strategy 4 introduced in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureLi2003Strategy9
      This class implements the similarity measure called strategy 9 introduced in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureLin
      This class implements the similarity measure introduced by Lin in the paper below: Lin, D.
      (package private) class  MeasureLiuStrategy1
      This class implements the similarity measures defined in equation (4) of the paper introduced by Liu et al.
      (package private) class  MeasureLiuStrategy2
      This class implements the similarity measures defined in equation (5) of the paper introduced by Liu et al.
      (package private) class  MeasureLogisticLin
      This class implements an unpublished logistic transformation of the Lin (1998) similarity prototyped by Lastra-Díaz and García-Serrano in the context of our research in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureLogisticNormJiangConrath
      This class implements an unpublished similarity measure defined by Lastra-Díaz and García-Serrano in the context of our research in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureMeng2012
      This class implements the IC similarity measure introduced by Meng and Gu in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureMeng2014
      This class implements the similarity measure introduced in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasurePedersenPath
      This class implements a similarity measure defined as the reciprocal of the Rada et al.
      (package private) class  MeasurePekarStaab
      This class implements the similarity measures defined in equation (2) of the paper introduced below.
      (package private) class  MeasurePirroSeco
      This class implements the measure introduced by Pirró and Seco in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureRada
      This class implements the semantic distance introduced by Rada et al.
      (package private) class  MeasureResnik
      This class implements the IC-based simialrity measure introduced by Resnik in the paper below.
      (package private) class  MeasureSanchez2012
      This functions implements the feature-based measure introduced by Sánchez et al.
      (package private) class  MeasureStojanovic
      This class implements the similarity measures defined in equation (9) of the paper introduced by Stojanovic et al.
      (package private) class  MeasureTaieb2014
      This function implements the similarity measures introduced by Hadj Taieb et al.
      (package private) class  MeasureWeightedJiangConrath
      This class implements the weighted Jiang-Conrath distance introduced by Lastra-Díaz and García-Serrano in the next paper.
